overview: This animated documentary explores the challenges of growing up and living with Asperger's Syndrome. Through techniques such as collage of photography, rotoscope, animated characters and live action footage and voice over narration, this films demonstrates that Asperger's is not simply 'being a little awkward, rather it is about adapting to one's limitations in the face of anxiety and isolation.
tagline: This animated documentary explores the challenges of growing up and living with Asperger's Syndrome.
title: A Life with Asperger's
